name: concrete, all types to generic market for concrete, medium strength | concrete, medium strength | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21523/documentation

This is a linking (transfering) activity which links the specific concrete types to the generic market for concrete, normal.;The shares of the different types of concrete are set based on production volumes of the respective activities and geographies.

The activity starts with the reception of a specific concrete.

The activity ends with concrete, normal which is supplied to the generic market for concrete, normal.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster
